<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.getLatestPeriodicEvent</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>getLatestPeriodicEvent</name> <script><![CDATA[function getLatestPeriodicEvent() { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_performance_event'); gr.addQuery('event_type', 'time'); gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) return gr.sys_id;
return ''; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-02-24 20:51:54</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2f3187c73b013200956c47b334efc4e1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>getLatestPeriodicEvent</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Stats Tools" source="com.glide.stats">83ddb0cb6d2220100acb70b353433005</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2f3187c73b013200956c47b334efc4e1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-02-24 20:51:54</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>223</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
